trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Ithaca
There were no other sightings in Ithaca on or around July 29th 2012
Summary: About 7-8 UFOs hovering over Cornell campus Ithaca - do not flash lights or fly in one direction like airplanes
divs: sighting detailsmy friends and i were getting out of the cab in cornell campus ithaca and i noticed a flashing red\white light in the sky. when me and my friends all noticed it, we focused and saw other lights about 6-8 lights flying in random directions across the sky and some were crossing each other (there is no way airplanes would fly close to each other in that pattern) i immediately knew that it wasn't a normal airplane because i study things about aircrafts. the object moves in a weird fashion and disoriented. it was too far up the sky to be a helicopter or any aircraft for that matter, and each one flew in separate directions and even went back and forth. we were all stunned and kept following the objects until they faded into the trees in the direction of niagra falls.
